sen.j: 医道（いどう 醫道）とは、日本律令制における医療そのものあるいはそのための教育（医学教育）を指す。
sen.e: "I-do" refers to the medical service under the Japanese "Ritsuryo system" (system of centralized regime based on the ritsuryo code), or the education of the youth to make them offer the service.
